attributes.action: Yarmouth and Lowestoft say no to potholes
attributes.additional_details: Poorly maintained roads in great Yarmouth and Lowestoft! Dodge those holes or destroy your car? Finding holes filled with sand or cones in the road but no workers how much longer are we the taxpayer,road tax payer and hard working citizen going to put up with this. Sign the petition and let's make sure government know we're not accepting this any longer.
